addr: 4251 27th Street Long Island City, New York 11101
title: GEMS YPB Holiday Gift Card Party
desc: You're invited to attend  GEMS' Annual Holiday Gift Card Party  hosted by the  GEMS Young Professionals Board! The Annual Holiday Gift Card Party provides gift cards for GEMS Members. Each year, the girls receive Christmas Gift Bags with essentials, gifts, and ? you guessed it ? a gift card. Help us bring holiday cheer to a number of girls and young women by donating a gift card and attending our party on  December 8 th ?from 6:30-9:30 PM at The Beast Next Door ! 100% of admission fees will benefit?Girls Educational & Mentoring Services (GEMS), the only organization in New York State specifically designed to serve girls and young women who have experienced commercial sexual exploitation and domestic trafficking. To learn more or for more ways to support, visit? www.gems-girls.org . ?What to Expect? We?ll be accepting $25 gift cards, cash, and credit cards at the door so don?t worry if you get to Duane Reade and realize that all the gift cards are gone! You WILL have the opportunity to specify where you?d like your gift card to come from in the event that you choose to pay at the door. Ideas for gift cards include Visa, Target, and Kmart. Special Thanks to: The Beast Next Door Please RSVP here to let us know to expect you - we can?t wait to see you!
